main event: An unidentified flying object sighting occurred on August 2, 1965, in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as disc shaped and dark blue to black in color,It was observed zig-zagging across the sky at an elevation of about 75 degrees, The object appeared much smaller than a dime and was sized similarly to a pin head, Witnesses reported that the object slowly veered to the side and disappeared after becoming smaller, The report was recorded by the local police department and sent to witnesses.
witness description: Two individuals including an officer from the local police department
